doc:
Jonathan Lovitz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_Lovitz 0 Jonathan Lovitz (born July 19, 1984) is an American lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) rights advocate, actor, and the Senior Vice President of the National LGBT Chamber of Commerce since 2015. He previously served as Communications Director and acting Executive Director of StartOut. Prior to advocacy, Lovitz was a performer in multiple national tours of Broadway shows, regional theatres, and television shows. Jonathan_Lovitz ( born July_19_,_1984 ) is an_American_lesbian , gay_,_bisexual_and_transgender ( LGBT ) rights_advocate , actor , and the_Senior_Vice_President of the_National_LGBT_Chamber of Commerce since 2015 . He previously served as Communications_Director and acting Executive_Director of StartOut . Prior to advocacy , Lovitz was a_performer in multiple_national_tours of Broadway shows , regional_theatres , and television_shows .
